Title: Reversing Heart Disease
Author: জুলিয়ান হোয়াইটকার
Summary:
AN UPDATE OF THE COMPLETE GUIDE TO CARDIAC CARE-PACKED WITH NEW WAYS TO CONQUER HEART
DISEASE WITHOUT DRUGS OR BYPASS SURGERY! 
Hundreds of thousands of American heart patients have used Dr. Julian Whitaker's bestselling REVERSING HEART DISEASE to successfully deal with cardiac problems naturally. Now, drawing on nearly twenty more years of experience at his Whitaker Wellness Institute. Dr. Whitaker examines modern medicine's latest diagnostic techniques, treatments, and drugs—and offers the newest improvements to his comprehensive cardiac program. 
• Discover the truth about angiograms and the ultrafast CT scan—the rarely discussed inaccuracies in readings and why they often steer patients toward unnecessary surgery 
• Find out why angioplasty and coronary-artery bypass surgery are overrated and overused—and explore non-invasive procedures that provide an alternative to heart surgery 
• Reduce cholesterol and lower blood pressure through diet and exercise with new recipes and exercise tips from the author 
• Learn which nutritional supplements, alternative therapies, and preventive strategies can help your heart-and which ones to avoid 
• Take advantage of heart-saving techniques for controlling stress, depression, and much more.
